Rule.title: Check if execute shield is enabled.

description.xhtml:p: The execute shield kernel option should be enabled in the sysctl configuration file.
Enabling execute shield makes the system less easy to exploit by some security vulnerabilities.

fixtext.xhtml:p: Add the following line to /etc/sysctl.conf or a separate file in /etc/sysctl.d: kernel.exec-shield = 1

Rule.title: Check if va randomization is enabled.

description.xhtml:p: The va randomization kernel option should be enabled in the sysctl configuration file.
Enabling va randomization makes the system less easy to exploit by some security vulnerabilities.

fixtext.xhtml:p: Add the following line to /etc/sysctl.conf or a separate file in /etc/sysctl.d: kernel.randomize_va_space = 1
